description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

* Course updated January 2015 *

Do you love to teach others, but you don't know how to create an information product that will excite potential students?

Do you want to use the Udemy platform to create courses, but you have no idea how to do it successfully?

This course is for YOU!

Totally geared toward beginner Udemy instructors, this course will walk you through:

  • WHY you want to use Udemy to create and market your video courses
  • HOW to outline your course effectively
  • Using the power of Amazon to sell Udemy courses
  • HOW to load your course on Udemy quickly and easily
  • The Udemy coupon system and how to best leverage it for success
  • How Udemy markets your courses
  • How to do your own outside marketing for more sales
  • Tools you need to get started
  • Steps to Success
  • And more!

Don't let the fear of the unknown keep you from sharing your knowledge and experience with the world through Udemy!
title: Create Udemy Courses That Attract Students - Unofficial
